fields.name: powerSetupValue
fields.description: Power setup value (0x00 = Full power, 0x01 = Balanced, 0x02 = Interval, 0x03 = Aggressive with 1 Hz, 0x04 = Aggressive with 2 Hz, 0x05 = Aggressive with 4 Hz (not supported for protocol versions 32.00 and later), 0xFF = Invalid (only when polling))

values.name: aggressive_4_hz
values.description: Aggressive with 4 Hz (not supported for protocol versions 32.00 and later)

fields.name: period
fields.description: Position update period and search period. Recommended minimum period is 10 s, although the receiver accepts any value bigger than 5 s. Only valid when powerSetupValue set to Interval, otherwise must be set to '0'.

fields.name: onTime
fields.description: Duration of the ON phase, must be smaller than the period. Only valid when powerSetupValue set to Interval, otherwise must be set to '0'.
